name: howler
description: Javascript audio library for the modern web.
author: James Simpson <james@goldfirestudios.com> (http://goldfirestudios.com)

scripts.build: uglifyjs src/howler.core.js -c -m -o dist/howler.core.min.js && uglifyjs src/plugins/howler.spatial.js -c -m -o dist/howler.spatial.min.js && uglifyjs src/howler.core.js -c -m -o dist/howler.core.min.js && uglifyjs src/plugins/howler.convolver.js -c -m -o dist/howler.convolver.min.js && uglifyjs src/howler.core.js -c -m -o dist/howler.core.min.js && uglifyjs src/plugins/howler.filter.js -c -m -o dist/howler.filter.min.js
scripts.release: node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'` && git tag $VERSION && git push && git push origin $VERSION && npm publish
